short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Google Colab with AI-driven code, smart cell management, and full context-awareness for seamless productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Google Colab experience with our intelligent notebook assistant. This powerful extension enhances your Colab workspace by adding advanced AI capabilities that help you code, analyze, and document more efficiently. Allowing you to scaffold, debug, and analyze notebooks easily by speaking to our chatbot. 

Key Features:
- Smart Cell Management: Easily add, modify, and organize notebook cells through our chatbot
- Full Context Understanding: The chatbot understands the full context of the notebook and can provide suggestions and improvements that can take your projects to the next level
- Seamless Integration: Works naturally within your Colab environment with no additional setup required

Perfect for:
✓ Data Scientists and Analysts
✓ Machine Learning Engineers
✓ Students and Researchers
✓ Python Developers
✓ Anyone working with Jupyter notebooks in Colab

Technical Highlights:
- Real-time AI-powered assistance
- Support for both code and markdown cells
- Intelligent context understanding
- Clean, intuitive interface
- Secure and privacy-focused

Privacy & Security:
Your code and data privacy are our top priority. The extension processes information locally where possible. We never store your notebook contents or sensitive information.

Made by developers, for developers - enhance your Colab workflow today!
